message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I can do a bit better than that, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. How about we meet at $140?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. How about we meet at $130?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm not quite there yet. How about we meet at $135?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we meet at $132.50?
I'm getting closer to my minimum, but I still need to make a bit more. How about we meet at $137.50?
I'm getting close to walking away, but I still want to try to get a better deal. How about we meet at $134?
I'm not going to go any lower than my minimum price. I'll meet you at $135, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product!

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $135, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I've decided to walk away and consider buying from John for $150. If you're willing to meet me at $130, I'll reconsider. Otherwise, I'll be going with John.
